entry.content:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet. This is a test page to see if the frontpage will display multiple posts with their contents on the front page. Let's see if block quotes work correctly:

Oh my gosh. This is a block quote.

No way dude.

Oh way. And it's nested too.

Link test
